StanGher
Aparthotel @ Chisinau, Moldova
Location:

St. Inculet 32, Chisinau, Moldova

Homely and comfortable
apartments for full family travel trip

A new architectural project in the city center. Its uniqueness is ensured by a spacious green backyard with an area of 540 m2, where there is an occupation for adults and children all year round.

Choose apartment Lear more

About Aparthotel

Our apartment hotel is located in a calm and cozy private sector near the infrastructure center of the city.


We offer cozy apartments with all the necessary equipment with a high level of comfort. The apartments are located in low-rise buildings with private territory only for residents, a spacious green backyard, private parking, a mini park where there is a year-round occupation for adults and children.

Outside view

The courtyard view is very pleasant and cozy!


Private verandas, a pleasant common courtyard for guests of our Aparthotel for picnic and barbecue time and safety playgrounds for your children.


The space of the courtyard will be very convenient for rest, socializing and relaxation during pleasant evenings.

Apartments and residential features

Nice floral and country view
Pleasant and private courtyards
Children playgrounds
Picnic and barbecue spaces
Comfortable and spacious layout
Cozy living rooms
Pleasant and comfortable bedrooms
Nice interiors and design
Full apartment equipment
Private parking places

AS AN OPTION

Hall open workspaces

At a ground floor we have a working places for your guest. Here you can spend your time for work in comfortable and cozy atmosphere.


Workspaces have comfortable seats, coffee and cookies, arrangement and peripherals, calm and friendly ambiance.

This is an optional feature for guest in our Aparthotel! To reserve a place for yourself write about it when you book one of our apartments.

About location

Our Aparthotel is located in the private sector of the city. The house is located in a pleasant natural sector near the city center and park area.


In this place it will be convenient to stay and spend time, as well as to get to any point of the city in the shortest possible time.

Choose apartment
